abstract: Horror fans offer a list of not-to-be-missed 1980s horror films.
snippet: Horror fans offer a list of not-to-be-missed 1980s horror films.
lead_paragraph: For a certain subset of horror fan, the high quality of Blu-ray is unwatchable compared with the painfully grainy-hazy look of VHS (especially do-it-yourself titles that look like they were made over a weekend in some guy's backyard). In recent years, small distributors and a few majors have released 1980s horror movies, mostly of the schlock variety, on special-edition VHS tapes as well as on DVD.

headline.main: Big Hair and Bad Blood: VHS-Era Horror Obscurities From A to Z
